abstract: ConocoPhillips plans to sell $5 billion to $10 billion of noncore assets over the next two years and use the proceeds to buy back shares and invest in its business.
snippet: ConocoPhillips plans to sell $5 billion to $10 billion of noncore assets over the next two years and use the proceeds to buy back shares and invest in its business.
lead_paragraph: ConocoPhillips announced on Wednesday that it would sell $5 billion to $10 billion of noncore assets in the next two years and use the proceeds to buy back shares and invest in its business.

headline.main: ConocoPhillips to Sell Up to $10 Billion of Assets
